name: Smile Train Speech App (Filipino)
description: This app is made for those born with a cleft palate or a hole in the nose, and aims to help individuals improve their speech and communication skills through interactive exercises and resources. To use the app correctly, it is recommended to consult a Speech Language Pathologist and have the guidance of a parent or adult, especially if the user is a child. ■ Tools used  »Unity 2021 »Photoshop CC »Illustrator CC »Audition CC »Figma »Blender I will be making a video about the creation of the game and sharing it on our Facebook , Twitter and Instagram page ... Stay tuned guys! Created by Raymond Cid from Don Romantiko Games. ▼DOWNLOAD  NOW!▼
